greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of non-primitive roots for n, less than n.
comment: a(n) will be the same as A219029(n) except when n is a member of A033949 or n = 1, i.e. n is not 2, 4, prime, power of a prime, twice a prime, or twice a prime power. In such cases, when n is a member of A033949, then a(n) = n-1.
xref: Cf. A008330 (number of primitive roots for the n-th prime, less than n-th prime).
Cf. A046144 (number of primitive roots for n, less than n).
results.author: _V. Raman_, Nov 10 2012
